# Imbue with Addiction (Spell)
## Overview
Transmutation

Level alchemist 2, mesmerist 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3

Casting Time 1 standard action

Components V, S, M (a dose of an addictive drug or substance)

Range touch

Target one living creature

Duration instantaneous

Saving Throw Fortitude negates

Spell Resistance yes

Source: Black Markets, pg. 19

The target immediately becomes addicted to the drug used as the material component during the casting of the spell. If the target was ever addicted to the drug at any point in the past, it takes a â€“4 penalty on its saving throw.
